ModMetaData.name: Three Sisters Industrial Roller
ModMetaData.author: FireFoX
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.1.0
*** Example Load Order *** - Core - VGP Three Sisters Plants - Industrial Rollers - Three Sisters Industrial Roller
Allows the three sister plants to be picked up by the green puller.
To contact me please use the github page. I'm not promising any quick responses.
